content.rendered:
Samoa Airways, formerly Polynesian Airlines, is the state-owned flag carrier airline of Samoa. The airline was founded in 1959 as “Polynesian Airlines”, providing domestic and international flights throughout the South Pacific.

Samoa Airways Baggage Allowance

Samoa Airways Baggage

View Samoa Airways Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

List of Samoa Airways Offices:

Samoa – Apia (Head)
Samoa – Apia
American Samoa – Pago Pago
Tonga-  Nuku’Alofa
New Zealand – Auckland
New Zealand – Auckland (Cargo)
Australia – Sydney

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Samoa Airways Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Samoa Airways: (click on the stars below)
